entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
